name: XX+ Game Jam (prototype)
description:
A short interactive experience exploring
personal boundaries on the streets
(prototype)

This was the result of the XX+ Game Jam 2016 in London,
where we had nine hours to create a game around the theme Borders.

Team:

Beatrice Marciniak,
Kirsten Moorman,
Linsey Raymaekers,
Jada Sangster,
Jessica Slusark,
Lauren Woodroffe

We are currently developing the game further into a more complete experience
featuring an androgynous main character on a walk home through the city.
It will be based on real experiences from real people, and with it we hope to raise
awareness about personal boundaries and harassment on the streets.
